application.name: Cheatcodes
application.description: View all the cheatcodes you will ever need!

tool.name: {game_name} Cheatcodes
tool.description: All the cheatcodes for {game_name} you will ever need!
tool.introduction: Welcome to {tool_name}! This tool has a lot of different cheatcodes for you. A cheatcode is a line of text or series of commands which can be used to change a game's behavior, alter a character's looks and abilities, skip levels, or access other hidden features.

questions.title: What are {game_name} cheatcodes?
questions.text: Cheatcodes in {game_name} are a serie of codes you can type into {game_name} to gain acces to advantages. Like getting some coins for free or getting an extra live. These codes were put in by the developers of {game_name} so that the public can try to find and use them.
